featured.text: D. Daniel To me, a zoo can be a good place for endangered species which have difficulty finding suitable mates in the wild.

definition.zh_def: 丹尼爾，一個常見的男性名字，源自希伯來語，意為「上帝是我的法官」。
definition.en_def: Daniel is a common male given name of Hebrew origin meaning 'God is my judge.'
definition.example: Daniel is studying hard for his upcoming exams.
